replies.body:
{{champion:99}} come on Guys ,we can do this! 
{{champion:85}} only if they suicide themselves, 18 times!
{{champion:99}} You are right! Let me try this. "Starts laughing" HAHAHAHIHIHIHAHA
{{champion:81}} Isnt that the Voice of an angel ?
{{champion:85}} I want to kill myself.
{{champion:33}} ok
I have baited a few people with that laugh. Almost as effective as {{champion:53}} and often less telegraphed because he is always trolling. Stay positive!

/surrender
'Ally team has refused to surrender, 1/4"
Something more relatable... That one duo who just doesn't want to surrender and you are 2 inhibs down... Have 7 kills vs 24... haven't got a single objective... And they just baroned. :P FeelsBad.
I think the best question would be how a game even made it to 0 - 57

Lux told the nexus to stay positive. So when it exploded, it refused to call the game, thus leaving everyone stuck in a single match.

Yes, a never-ending nightmare match would be Lux's fault.
The wombo combo team comp though. Sona ult + Kennen ult = chain CC, with lux and ez for burst, and Rammus for the cleanup.
With that comp? Easy win if they farm up and team fight.

Lux then builds Mejais, instant penta kills and everyone pushes mid with baron buff and wins the game in under the respawn timers.

I have actually been in over 30 games and won them all like this. You can always recover, with a bit of psychological warfare
Ranked is fun.
most of lux players are actually pretty rude
they spamm laugh..... AHHHHHHH THAT'S WHY I SEND THEM TO THE GRAY SCREEN

Rude.  Lux main here, and I don't spam laugh unless my teammates force me to.

So here's a random gif for your insolence.

https://media.giphy.com/media/trPCHV3aviMog/giphy.gif
this gif doesnt affect me cause i live with this monstrocity daily cause i've the same dog breed eks dee
aww i was hoping for some kind of free proton type of joke.

Cute comic! :)
Source?
Yes.

Sona: 6/11/33
Ezreal: 18/10/20
Kennen: 16/9/26
Lux: 15/15/30
This sounds like a 3-to-2 surrender vote to me.
does lux say "recoverable" or something.
Nah, but she does say, "I never think about losing."
hihihahahahahahHIAHAHAHAHAHAHA !

Keep Calm and Stay HIV Positive

So is ezreal lying about his kda? because shouldn't it be 0/0/0 because he mystic shifts away from fights the moment rammus initiates leaving everyone else to die constantly thus resulting in everyone elses terrible KDA? because thats kinda what bad ezreals do.
